execution_plan.description: Get the distinct pairs of receipt numbers and item identifiers from the items database. These identify which items were sold on which receipts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt, Item FROM items;

execution_plan.description: Fetch prices for the items referenced in step 1 from the goods database. This returns item id and its price for items sold (filtered by item ids from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step1.Item);

execution_plan.description: Fetch the dates for the receipts referenced in step 1 from the receipts database. This returns receipt number and its date (filtered by receipt numbers from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step1.Receipt);
